channel.title: [POLL] New Logo Or The Old One?
channel.description:
So according to the other poll i made the majority thought i should change the logo.Well i did. So is this one better?
[poll type=regular public=true] * This Logo is way better * The old logo was definitely better [/poll] (The old one) I took the first letter of this logo (S) And made it into another logo :arrow_down_small: ![37|497x500](upload://fV6JWm6LyT1LOuGoSxrtqDwcn3F.jpg) And here is the new one with the letter S in braille alphabet.:arrow_down_small: ![55|499x500](upload://pZIJ9hyVILk7P0EDpRcLYuwJ0Vp.jpg) And here is the NEW NEW one ![BUMU%3F|500x500](upload://vlvt0rcI3jwVIMQevrSAsMYkwod.jpeg)

item.source: [POLL] New Logo Or The Old One?

item.title: [POLL] New Logo Or The Old One?
item.dc:creator: lowey
item.description:
One other thing: rebranding should be done with caution. People on this forum seem to want to have logos and, by extension, a brand, but also seem to want to drastically change those logos (and even their name!) on a regular basis. That path leads to confusion and negates the purpose of having the logo and brand in the first place.

It‚Äôs best to make small changes that are still recognisable to those familiar with the old logo‚Ä¶ except when fixing something that‚Äôs completely broken (eg if you created the logo years ago and now realise there‚Äôs a giant mismatch between your logo and name, or your logo and the rest of your brand, or whatever)

Read full topic
item.source: [POLL] New Logo Or The Old One?

item.title: [POLL] New Logo Or The Old One?
item.dc:creator: lowey
item.description:
My 2p as a designer: don‚Äôt use Braille - a medium designed for blind people - to create a logotype - a medium designed for sighted people. It‚Äôs an original idea and all, but the aim of a logotype is to create a single strong visual brand that‚Äôs instantly recognisable. The Braille S on its own achieves that better than the SY, and has the merit of acting as a logotype to sighted people, or as a Braille S to blind people (although that wouldn‚Äôt matter unless you were printing it thermographed or embossed or something‚Ä¶ which I expect you‚Äôre not)

Keep in mind that sighted people recognise lettering, simple geometric shapes and iconography better than anything else. Braille is designed to be easily identified by touch, not to be quickly visually recognised.

I‚Äôd vote on the poll except, by this point, I‚Äôm so confused between all the different logos that I don‚Äôt know what I‚Äôd be voting for. If you‚Äôre going to use one or the other I‚Äôd strongly recommend using the single Braille S.

Read full topic
item.source: [POLL] New Logo Or The Old One?

item.title: [POLL] New Logo Or The Old One?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Fwiw, I expect most people will see it as a stylised, gestalt ‚Äúr s‚Äô.

It‚Äôs one thing to have a logo that very few understand. It‚Äôs another thing to have one that the majority understand wrongly.

Is that going to be ok with you?

Read full topic
